backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles with Stripe API keys, artist management, product/donation listings, Stripe checkout integration, admin Stripe account configuration, split payment processing, and payment setup validation with authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that transforms old UserProfile records (name, email, bio) to new format by adding a nullable stripeApiKey field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: artist payment configuration UI, admin Stripe account setup, split payment processing integration, and payment validation in checkout flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing the marketplace UI including product listings, admin/artist dashboards, payment configuration, Stripe integration, and authorization flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including primary, secondary, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Artisan Hub Marketplace application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for marketplace, admin, artist, and payment pages, plus QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and Toaster setup.
frontend/src/components/AdminNav.tsx: Navigation component rendering admin-specific links to dashboard, user management, and revenue analytics with icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminStripeAccou: Card component for admin to configure platform Stripe account ID with validation, status badge, and warning when not configured to receive commission payments.
frontend/src/components/ArtistBenefits.t: Displays a grid of four benefit cards (Global Exposure, Secure Payments, Easy Management, Fair Compensation) for artists using icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ArtistListItem.t: Renders a card for an individual artist profile with avatar, name, email, Stripe status, and an activate/deactivate toggle button.
Provides a UI for uploading multiple images at once, creating a product for each image with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyNowButton.tsx: A button component that initiates Stripe checkout for a product, validating that both artist and admin payment configurations are complete before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/CommissionSettin: Admin form to view and update the platform commission rate percentage, showing how much artists receive after commission.
frontend/src/components/DonationCard.tsx: Displays a donation product card with suggested amount, custom amount input dialog, and payment configuration validation before processing donations.
frontend/src/components/DonationForm.tsx: Dialog form for artists to create donation options with title, description, suggested amount, and category fields.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component providing header navigation, mobile menu, footer with social links, and profile setup modal. Conditionally renders admin and user navigation based on authentication and role.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error handling. Clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodSet: Payment configuration interface allowing artists to set up Stripe API keys or Stripe Connect. Displays current payment status with badges and provides forms for managing payment methods.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card with image carousel, video support, category badge, and buy button. Shows payment configuration status and includes navigation controls for multiple images.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation requiring name and email with optional bio field. Non-dismissible until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/StoreSettingsFor: Form component for managing artist store settings including store name, bio, banner image upload with progress tracking, and social media links. Uses react-hook-form for validation and state management.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: React component for configuring Stripe payment settings, allowing admins to input secret key and allowed countries, with form validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/UserNav.tsx: Navigation component displaying links to artist dashboard and artist registration with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing it with Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session by calling the backend actor with shopping items and success/cancel URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity delegation, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, artists, products, Stripe configuration, store settings, and shopping cart functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with role-based access control, displaying Stripe configuration, commission settings, and admin Stripe account setup components.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDashboard.tsx: Artist dashboard page for managing products, donations, store settings, and payment methods with media upload functionality for images and videos.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistRegistration.ts: Artist registration form page that collects name and email to register a new artist profile, with benefits display and authentication check.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistStorePage.tsx: Public-facing artist store page displaying banner, bio, social links, and tabbed product/donation listings filtered by artist ID.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment failure confirmation page with error message and navigation back to marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page with thank you message and continue shopping button.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Main marketplace page with hero banner and tabbed view of all products and donation options across all artists.
frontend/src/pages/RevenueAnalytics.tsx: Admin-only revenue analytics dashboard showing total revenue, commission breakdown, artist earnings, and transaction metrics with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/UserManagement.tsx: Admin-only page that displays a list of all registered artists with their status, using role-based access control to redirect non-admin users to the products page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata and state tracking for Artisan Hub Marketplace, documenting architectural decisions (Stripe Connect, 90/10 revenue split), existing features, and implementation priorities for the creative marketplace platform.
